question:
You work at home and have a problem with a piece of quipment that you use for your job.
Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter
-describe the problem with the equipment
-explain how this problem is affecting your work
-say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing you concerning a problem I noticed on my newly acquired laptop from your company. Recently, I noticed that the battery doesn't charge well enough to the maximum percentage, meaning that if I have to unplug and work, the laptop will shut down sooner than expected.

Actually, I would have not bothered you with this issue. However, it is obstructing my work, because once I disconnect from a power source, the laptop will shut down and I will automatically lose all my unsaved work, and that to me is devastating.

Therefore, I would kindly request you to send your technical support to my office in order to have a look at it and profer a solution to this anomaly. If we have to do any replacement of any parts, I believe your company will handle that because the laptop is under warranty.
Finally, I will be waiting for your company staff to come around for the pick-up, do have a wonderful day ahead of you.
